question: Which among the following is true about solubility of “Lipids”?
option1: They are soluble in water but insoluble in organic solvents
option2: They are insoluble in water but soluble in organic solvents
option3: They are soluble in water as well as organic solvents
option4: They are insoluble in water as well as organic solvents
answer: They are insoluble in water but soluble in organic solvents
